title: Bbq Stew
instructions: Cut the planted into bite-sized pieces and sear in a hot pan with olive oil until browned. Set aside.
In the same pot, saut√© diced onions, bell peppers, and garlic until softened, about 5 minutes.
Add diced potatoes, carrots, and your favorite BBQ sauce along with vegetable broth.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes until vegetables are tender.
Add the seared planted back to the stew and cook for another 5 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper to taste, and serve hot garnished with fresh parsley.
